title: 2014 re-draft & Daniel Jeremiah
itunes:title: 2014 re-draft & Daniel Jeremiah
description:
A room with some heroes -- Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler -- discuss the latest NFL news (3:00) including Greg Hardy's suspension and Russell Wilson's love for baseball. The guys then conduct a redraft of the 2014 NFL Draft before discussing this year's event with former NFL scout Daniel Jeremiah.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
